subject: svn commit: samba-web r1102 - in trunk: .
body:
Author: jerry
Date: 2007-04-22 11:25:42 +0000 (Sun, 22 Apr 2007)
New Revision: 1102

WebSVN: http://websvn.samba.org/cgi-bin/viewcvs.cgi?view=rev&root=samba-web&rev=1102

Log:
announce 3.0.25rc2
Modified:
   trunk/index.html


Changeset:
Modified: trunk/index.html
===================================================================
--- trunk/index.html	2007-04-16 11:28:58 UTC (rev 1101)
+++ trunk/index.html	2007-04-22 11:25:42 UTC (rev 1102)
@@ -19,28 +19,28 @@
 
     Current Release
 
-    9 Apr 2007
-    Samba 3.0.25rc1 Available for Download
+    22 Apr 2007
+    Samba 3.0.25rc2 Available for Download
 
-    Samba 3.0.25rc1 is now available for download.  This is the first
+    Samba 3.0.25rc2 is now available for download.  This is the first
     release candidate of the next upgrade production release version
     of Samba.  An RC release means that the version is close to the
     final production release, but there may be a few lingering bugs.
     For this reason, it is intended for testing purposes only.  Please 
     test and report any bugs that you
     find.  Please read the changes in the 
-    Release Notes
+    Release Notes
     for details on new features and difference in behavior from 
     previous releases.
 
-    The Samba 3.0.25rc1
+    The Samba 3.0.25rc1
     source code can be downloaded now.  The GnuPG
+    href="/samba/ftp/rc/samba-3.0.25rc2.tar.asc">GnuPG
     signature is for the for the uncompressed tarball.  
     If you prefer, the patch 
+    href="/samba/ftp/rc/patch-3.0.25rc1-3.0.25rc2.diffs.gz">patch 
     file against Samba 
-    3.0.25pre2 (GnuPG 
+    3.0.25pre2 (GnuPG 
     signature) is also available for download.   
     Please read these instructions on  
     how to verify the gpg signature.  Precompiled packages will
